## How to launch the shiny app
1. From the `Penobscot_Water` project, select the `shiny` folder, then the `field_report_shiny_app` folder, and finally the `field_report` folder
2. Open the `app.R` (the actual Shiny app) file and the `run_data.R` (an R script to read in the data) file
3. In the `app.R` file, load the packages by selecting lines 2-19 and pressing control + return
4. In the `run_data.R` file, load the data by selecting all and pressing control + return
5. Return to the `app.R` file and click `Run App` in the upper right corner of the panel
6. Run the app!
